meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by the bacterium Neisseria gonorrhoeae.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for the gonococcal infection.
meanings.sent2: The gonococcal bacteria were identified under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The gonococcal bacteria threw a party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: The gonococcal invasion in the body was like an army storming a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the gonococcal culture was striking.

meanings.sent1: She was diagnosed with a gonococcal infection after the test results.
meanings.sent2: The gonococcal symptoms included pain during urination.
meanings.sent3: The gonococcal bacteria decided to take a vacation in the urinary tract.
meanings.sent4: The gonococcal spread in the community was like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The pungent odor was a clear sign of the gonococcal presence.
